summary: WHEN DRIVING AT LOW SPEEDS, THE VEHICLE SURGED FORWARD.  THIS CAUSED THE CONSUMER TO LOSE CONTROL OF THE VEHICLE AND HIT A LIGHT POLE HEAD ON.  UPON IMPACT,  BOTH FRONTAL AIR BAGS DID NOT DEPLOY.  THE CONSUMER HAD THE VEHICLE TOWED TO THE INSURANCE COMPANY'S DESIGNATED REPAIR FACILITY.   *AK   THIS WAS QUICKLY FOLLOWED BY 2-3 MORE ACCELERATIONS IN WHICH THE VEHICLE GAINED SPEED EACH TIME.  THE VEHICLE FELT AS IF IT WERE BEING SHIFTED INTO THE NEXT GEAR.   *SC   *JB
